Summary: Add support for RabbitMQ 4
Add support for Valkey 8.x
All the Adobe Commerce project laminas/dependencies are compatible with PHP 8.4
Add support for the latest OpenSearch 2.19
Replacement of Laminas abandoned repos
2.4.8 Core Quality Improvements
Make ES8 to be default for 2.4.8 instead of ES7
401 and 403 HTTP response codes for GraphQL API
Custom field (Release Note): Improved GraphQL API security by ensuring that requests with expired customer tokens now return a 401 Unauthorized response instead of returning guest data. This change aligns with expected behavior for headless applications.

Summary: Update the API to support merging guest orders with the account associated with the same email
Custom field (Release Note): Updated the API to support merging guest orders with customer accounts when the email addresses match. Orders placed by guests are now automatically associated with the corresponding customer account upon registration or if an existing account with the same email is found.

Summary: Include "cart summary" related fields in guestOrder/guestOrderByToken GQL
Custom field (Release Note): Enhanced the guestOrder and guestOrderByToken GraphQL responses to include missing cart summary-related fields for order confirmation. Introduced the OrderItemPrices type and added original_price and original_price_including_tax fields to both OrderItemPrices and CartItemPrices. The prices field now includes detailed pricing information, allowing the order confirmation page to display a more complete cart summary, including total quantity, item details, and pre-discount prices.

Summary: Include field "is_virtual" in "CustomerOrder" GQL type
Custom field (Release Note): Added the is_virtual field to the CustomerOrder GraphQL type, similar to the Cart type. This allows the customer to conditionally hide shipping information for orders containing only virtual products.

Summary: Deliver Order Grand_Total Without Tax in CartPrices
Custom field (Release Note): Added a new grand_total_excluding_tax field to the CartPrices GraphQL response. This field returns the total of the cart, including discounts, shipping, and other fees, excluding tax. The grand_total_excluding_tax is also available in the estimatedTotals mutation, providing an estimated order total without tax. This enhancement allows for more accurate cart summaries when the “Additionally Show Order Total Without Tax” option is enabled in the Store Config’s Shopping Cart Display Settings.

Summary: Include custom address attributes in guestOrder and guestOrderByToken queries
Custom field (Release Note): Updated the guestOrder and guestOrderByToken GraphQL queries to include custom address attributes. This ensures that addresses can be successfully created for guest users after sign-up on the order confirmation page, even when merchants have configured required custom address attributes.

Summary: Bundle products does not show original price and the final price has no currency
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed an issue where bundle products in the cart query did not display the original price, and the final price lacked currency information. The query response now includes the original price and adds the currency to bundle_options.values.price for accurate pricing details.

Summary: add custom attributes in OrderAddress used in CustomerOrder GQL
Implement order history filter based on created_at
Custom field (Release Note): Implemented an order history filter based on the created_at field and exposed date_of_first_order with the CustomerOrders type

Summary: Deliver available inventory amount in error message
Implement possibility to create return as a guest user
Custom field (Release Note): Added support for guest RMA requests in existing database tables by introducing the confirmation_key column and UNCONFIRMED status to track RMA confirmations. Guests must pass a token with the returnGuestRequest GraphQL API to create an RMA with an unconfirmed status, and use the confirmReturn GraphQL API with the confirmation key to confirm the return.

Summary: Error codes for order cancellation
Custom field (Release Note): Mapped error codes with corresponding error messages for order cancellation.

Summary: GraphQL | cancelOrder mutation
Add theme field to recaptchaV3Config query
Custom field (Release Note): Exposed theme field to the ReCaptchaConfigurationV3 type.

Summary: GraphQL: Provide available order actions
Custom field (Release Note): Exposed CustomerOrder.available_actions to display the available actions for an order.

Summary: GraphQL | Order Edit | Add Customer Information to Customer Order type
Custom field (Release Note): Exposed OrderCustomerInfo to the CustomerOrder type.

Summary: Add quantity to ProductInterface
Custom field (Release Note): Exposed quantity with ProductInterface and synchronized it with the product stock option-related configuration.

Summary: Introduce InsufficientStockError type
Custom field (Release Note): Introduced the InsufficientStockError type to manage errors when adding products to the cart due to insufficient stock.

Summary: Change updateCartItems mutation response
Custom field (Release Note): Updated the updateCartItems mutation to return a success response with errors, instead of throwing exceptions.

Summary: Insufficient and unavailable quantity notifications
Custom field (Release Note): Updated the notifications for insufficient and unavailable quantities

Summary: Add order status date tracking and API coverage
Custom field (Release Note): Exposed order_status_change_date with the Order GraphQL API to display order status change date

Summary: Add error code for decimal quantity in UpdateCartItems mutation response
Add pagination to customer addresses GraphQL
Custom field (Release Note): Introduced customer.addressesV2 in the customer query, adding pagination for customer addresses.

Summary: Request order token for guest order cancellation
Custom field (Release Note): Made the cancelOrder mutation accessible only to registered customers and introduced a new requestGuestOrderCancel mutation, which requires an order token (similar to the guestOrderByToken input).

Summary: Documentation for added UNCONFIRMED status to the RMA (Returns)
Custom field (Release Note):
Documentation updates added for Guest RMA, including details about Guest RMA GraphQL APIs and the newly added UNCONFIRMED status.
GraphQL APIs: requestGuestReturn, confirmReturn.

Summary: Expose Tax Display Settings via GraphQL
Custom field (Release Note): Exposed Tax Display Settings via GraphQL for orders, invoices, credit memos, and related entities.

Summary: Modify guest order token generation to use lastname instead of postcode
Custom field (Release Note): Some countries consider the postcode optional. As a result, some guest users faced issues while fetching tokens during order placement or retrieving already placed orders using a token. Guest GraphQL APIs for fetching orders, requesting order cancellations, and requesting returns were modified by updating the token logic and using the last name instead of the postcode.

Summary: extend cart and customerCart GQL queries to know if the shipping addresses and billing address are the same or not
Custom field (Release Note): Extended the ShippingCartAddress GraphQL API to introduce the same_as_billing field, which indicates whether the shipping and billing addresses are the same.

Summary: return identifier of the address book's address set on shipping/billing cart addresses for customerCart query
Custom field (Release Note): Extended CartAddressInterface to introduce an identifier for the address book in shipping or billing cart address.

Summary: Update logic to store guest RMA into existing tables and handle impacted areas
Remove Order Edit related funcionality implemented in the scope of LYNX-482 and LYNX-483
Inconsistency between attribute values in GraphQL queries and mutations
Custom field (Release Note): Updated the Return Request mutation for the RMA items input to resolve inconsistencies between the return attribute related query and mutation

Summary: Expose Tax Display Settings via GraphQL in a correct way
Custom field (Release Note): Refined the exposure of Tax Display Settings via GraphQL.

Summary: REORDER action in order.availableActions
Custom field (Release Note): REORDER action in order.availableActions updated as per store configuration

Summary: Update date format returned by OrderStatusChangeDate resolver
Custom field (Release Note): Updated the OrderStatusChangeDate resolver to return the order status change date in the default format without additional reformatting, ensuring consistency across responses.

Summary: Investigate  issues with B2B WebAPI Tests for Storefront-Compatibility Package
Gift Card - Extend customer.orders query
Custom field (Release Note): Extended the customer.orders query to include the applied_gift_cards field, allowing retrieval of applied gift card data similar to applied_coupons. Now, customers can see gift card codes used in their orders via GraphQL.

Summary: Gift Options - Fix issue with customer.orders query
Custom field (Release Note): Updated the customer.orders query to correctly process the gift_message field.

Summary: Gift Options - Extend cart query
Custom field (Release Note): Gift message and Gift wrapping exposed to GiftCardCartItem; updated logic to discard Gift wrapping for virtual products.

Summary: Gift Options - Extend products query
Custom field (Release Note): Enhanced the products query in GraphQL by adding gift_wrapping_available and gift_wrapping_price fields. The gift_wrapping_price is now returned as a price object for better consistency.

Summary: Gift Options - Extend storeConfig query
Custom field (Release Note): Extended the storeConfig query to include printed_card_priceV2 to return a price object instead of a string.

Summary: Deliver subtotals fields in placeOrder mutation
Custom field (Release Note): Exposed OrderTotal.subtotal_excl_tax and OrderTotal.subtotal_incl_tax, while marking OrderTotal.subtotal as deprecated.

Summary: Error when item in return is out of stock
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed the issue where the customer.returns query returned an internal server error when an item in the return was out of stock. Now, product data is correctly returned, even if the item is out of stock, ensuring consistent response handling.

Summary: Include store credit / reward points data to order payload
Custom field (Release Note): Extended the CustomerOrder GraphQL interface to include store credit and reward points applied to the order totals. Now, the order payload returns the label and value for both store credit and reward points, ensuring complete cost summary details.

Summary: Gift options pricing and taxes calculation
Custom field (Release Note): Extended the GiftOptionsPrices and OrderTotal interfaces in GraphQL to include both price_excluding_tax and price_including_tax for gift wrapping (per item and order) and printed cards. This enhancement ensures accurate tax display based on store configuration settings for both cart and order queries.

Summary: Provide top level customer group related information via GraphQL API
Custom field (Release Note): Added the customerGroup query to expose customer group-related information via the GraphQL API for guests and customers

Summary: Provide catalog rules related information via GraphQL API
Custom field (Release Note): Added store configurations for catalog rule and the allCatalogRules query to list all available catalog rules, and exposed Product.rules to return the the applied catalog rules to current product

Summary: Provide cart rules related information via GraphQL API
Custom field (Release Note): Added GraphQL support for retrieving cart rule information. Introduced new store configurations to control exposure of all and applied cart rules, along with the allCartRules query and Cart.rules field for fetching active cart rules.

Summary: Provide customer group related information via GraphQL API
Custom field (Release Note): Added store configurations for customer group, the allCustomerGroups query to list all customer groups, and exposed Customer.group to return the current customer’s group.

Summary: Correct GraphQL type name CustomerGroup -> customerGroup
Custom field (Release Note): Updated GraphQL type for customerGroup query

Summary: Deliver Terms & Conditions configuration in StoreConfig
Custom field (Release Note):
Added support for retrieving terms and conditions configuration settings via the StoreConfig GraphQL query.
New Configurations Available:
- Stores > Settings > Configuration > Checkout > Checkout Options > Enable Terms and Conditions
These settings enable frontend applications to dynamically enable and configure terms and conditions by store view in checkout page.

Summary: Provide customer segments related information via GraphQL API
Custom field (Release Note): Exposed customer segments related information via GraphQL APIs

Summary: Return only free payment method when the order total is 0
Custom field (Release Note): Updated the checkout process for GraphQl to display only the “Free” payment method when the order total is zero. This enhancement reduces shopper confusion and ensures a smoother purchasing experience.

Summary: Enhance Gift Options handling during cart merge
Custom field (Release Note): Enhanced gift options handling during cart merges to ensure a more consistent user experience. Gift options now follow a prioritized merging logic, preventing unintended overrides when a guest user logs in and their cart is merged with an existing customer cart.
